alert.note: Alert for Inland Miami-Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 1:14PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade County through 145 PM EDT... At 114 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, or 11 miles north of The Redland, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Country Walk, Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, The Hammocks, Miccosukee Resort, Kendale Lakes, Kendall West, and Three Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
